props.title: Welcome
props.description: We gather in the name of Christ.

props.title: Welcome
props.content:
Welcome to Capital Pres Herndon. 
My name is ______, and I'm one of the pastors here...

props.title: Call to Worship
props.description: The Lord invites us to meet with him in worship.

props.title: Psalm 100
props.content:
Leader: Shout for joy to the Lord, all the earth.

Worship the Lord with gladness;

come before him with joyful songs.


All: Know that the Lord is God.

It is he who made us, and we are his;

we are his people, the sheep of his pasture.


Leader: Enter his gates with thanksgiving

and his courts with praise;

give thanks to him and praise his name.


All: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever;

his faithfulness continues through all generations.

props.title: Invocation
props.description: We invite the Lord to meet with us.

props.title: Songs of Praise
props.description: We worship God in song, remembering who He is and what he has done.

props.title: How Great (Psalm 145)
props.content:
I’ll bless Your name, O God, each day that I awake From dawn to setting sun, Your greatness I’ll proclaim Your glory far exceeds all human thought So with each breath I’ll bless Your name, O God

Your name will be revered by children yet to come As generations sing of wonders You have done Your strong and mighty deeds are always near O God Most High, Your name will be revered

Refrain: How great is the Lord and greatly to be praised! How great is the Lord our God How great is the Lord and greatly to be praised!

Your gracious hand provides for all who live and breathe Your mercy runs to find the helpless and the weak When we call out to You, You hear our cries And all our needs Your gracious hand provides

Refrain

Forever without end, creation will rejoice When works of wicked men, You finally destroy Your power we’ll proclaim till Christ descends And You will reign forever without end

Refrain
props.citation: Music and words by Bob Kauflin, Jordan Kauflin, and Nathan Stiff © 2022 Sovereign Grace Worship/ASCAP, Sovereign Grace Praise/BMI (administrated by Integrity Music). Sovereign Grace Music, a division of Sovereign Grace Churches. All rights reserved.

props.title: Welcome

Welcome to Capital Pres Herndon. 
My name is ______, and I'm one of the pastors here...

props.title: Confession
props.description: We acknowledge our sins to the Lord and to one another.

props.content:
Most merciful God,

we confess that we have sinned against you

in thought, word, and deed, by what we have done,

and by what we have left undone.

We have not loved you with our whole heart;

we have not loved our neighbors as ourselves.

We are truly sorry and we humbly repent.

For the sake of your Son Jesus Christ,

have mercy on us and forgive us;

that we may delight in your will, and walk in your ways,

to the glory of your Name. Amen.

props.title: Assurance
props.description: God assures us of our forgiveness in Christ.

props.title: The Peace
props.description: We receive God's peace and extend it to others.

props.title: Church Life Updates
props.description: God is at working in and through us.

props.title: Congregational Prayer
props.description: We bring our personal and communal concerns to our Father in heaven.

props.title: Congregational Prayer
props.description: We bring our personal and communal concerns to our Father in heaven.

props.title: Song of Preparation
props.description: We ready our hearts to recieve God's Word.

props.title: Sermon
props.description: God speaks to us by the preaching of his Word..

props.title: Song of Response
props.description: We respond to God's Word in song.

props.title: Benediction
props.description: God sends us out with his blessing.
